verses.text: \w The|strong="G3588"\w* ancients \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w that|strong="G3767"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w I|strong="G2532"\w* beseech, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w am|strong="G3195"\w* myself \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w an|strong="G2532"\w* ancient, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w witness|strong="G3144"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w sufferings|strong="G3804"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*: \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w partaker|strong="G2844"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w that|strong="G3767"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G3195"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w revealed|strong="G0601"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* time \w to|strong="G3195"\w* \w come|strong="G3195"\w*:

Feed \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w flock|strong="G4168"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, taking care \w of|strong="G2316"\w* it, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* constraint, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w willingly|strong="G1596"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*: \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w for|strong="G1722"\w* filthy lucreâ€™s sake, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w voluntarily|strong="G1596"\w*:

\w Neither|strong="G3366"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* lording it over \w the|strong="G3588"\w* clergy, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w being|strong="G1096"\w* \w made|strong="G1096"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w pattern|strong="G5179"\w* \w of|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w flock|strong="G4168"\w* \w from|strong="G3588"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* heart.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* prince \w of|strong="G1391"\w* pastors \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w appear|strong="G5319"\w*, \w you|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w receive|strong="G2865"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* never fading \w crown|strong="G4735"\w* \w of|strong="G1391"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.

\w In|strong="G2316"\w* \w like|strong="G3668"\w* \w manner|strong="G3668"\w*, ye \w young|strong="G3501"\w* \w men|strong="G3956"\w*, \w be|strong="G3956"\w* \w subject|strong="G5293"\w* \w to|strong="G1325"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* ancients. \w And|strong="G1161"\w* \w do|strong="G1325"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* insinuate \w humility|strong="G5012"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w to|strong="G1325"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* resisteth \w the|strong="G3956"\w* proud, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1325"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w humble|strong="G5011"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* giveth \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*.

\w Be|strong="G2316"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w humbled|strong="G5013"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w mighty|strong="G2900"\w* \w hand|strong="G5495"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w he|strong="G3767"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w exalt|strong="G5312"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w time|strong="G2540"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* visitation:

\w Casting|strong="G1977"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w your|strong="G3956"\w* \w care|strong="G3199"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* hath \w care|strong="G3199"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

Be \w sober|strong="G3525"\w* \w and|strong="G1127"\w* \w watch|strong="G1127"\w*: because \w your|strong="G5101"\w* \w adversary|strong="G0476"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w devil|strong="G1228"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w roaring|strong="G5612"\w* \w lion|strong="G3023"\w*, goeth \w about|strong="G5613"\w* \w seeking|strong="G2212"\w* \w whom|strong="G5101"\w* \w he|strong="G5613"\w* may \w devour|strong="G2666"\w*.

\w Whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w resist|strong="G0436"\w* ye, \w strong|strong="G4731"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*: \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* affliction befalls \w your|strong="G1722"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0081"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G3739"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* hath \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w us|strong="G1519"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G0846"\w*, \w after|strong="G1161"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w have|strong="G3956"\w* \w suffered|strong="G3958"\w* \w a|strong="G2564"\w* \w little|strong="G3641"\w*, \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w* \w perfect|strong="G2675"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w confirm|strong="G4741"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w establish|strong="G4741"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*.

\w To|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* be glory \w and|strong="G0165"\w* empire \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* \w and|strong="G0165"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*. \w Amen|strong="G0281"\w*.

\w By|strong="G1223"\w* Sylvanus, \w a|strong="G5613"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w think|strong="G3049"\w*, \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w written|strong="G1125"\w* \w briefly|strong="G3641"\w*: \w beseeching|strong="G3870"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w testifying|strong="G1957"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w true|strong="G0227"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, wherein \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w stand|strong="G2476"\w*.

\w The|strong="G3588"\w* church \w that|strong="G1722"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Babylon|strong="G0897"\w*, elected \w together|strong="G4899"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, saluteth \w you|strong="G5210"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w so|strong="G2532"\w* doth \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w son|strong="G5207"\w* \w Mark|strong="G3138"\w*.

Salute \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w a|strong="G1722"\w* holy \w kiss|strong="G5370"\w*. Grace \w be|strong="G3956"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3956"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* Jesus. Amen.
